CustomField.description: This settings enables the users to select the recipient role name while adding a recipient and makes the tagging order explicit. When enabled, users will see an additional option list to select the role name for the recipient on the add recipient view.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This settings enables the users to select the recipient role name while adding a recipient and makes the tagging order explicit. When enabled, users will see an additional option list to select the role name for the recipient on the add recipient view.
CustomField.label: Recipient Roles Enabled
